Our triage bot has automatically labeled this issue based on the content. A maintainer will review it soon.

## What happens next?

1. **Automated Triage**: Labels have been applied based on keywords and content
2. **Maintainer Review**: A team member will verify the labels and priority
3. **Information Gathering**: We may ask for additional details if needed
4. **Prioritization**: Once triaged, the issue will be added to our project board
5. **Development**: The issue will be worked on according to its priority

## How you can help

- Provide additional context, screenshots, or error logs if relevant
- Respond to any questions from maintainers
- Test any proposed fixes when available

Feel free to ask questions or provide updates as needed. We appreciate your contribution to making AINative Studio better!
